personal.name: Mahmoud Elkady
personal.tagline: I build intelligent automation systems that run your business for you.

services.title: End-to-End AI Automation
services.description: Complete business process automation using n8n, Make.com, and custom scripts.

services.title: AI & CRM Integration
services.description: Seamlessly connect AI models with your CRM, databases, and internal tools.

services.title: Custom AI Agents
services.description: Build autonomous agents that handle customer support, lead gen, and more.

services.title: Image Generation Pipelines
services.description: Automated workflows for generating product images, marketing assets, and more.

services.title: Automation Dashboards
services.description: Custom internal tools and dashboards to monitor your automated operations.

projects.title: Automated Lead Assignment & Sales Notifications Workflow
projects.description: A fully automated pipeline that routes inbound leads to the correct sales representative based on rules, triggers instant Slack notifications, and logs all activity in HubSpot—removing manual work and speeding up response time.

projects.title: AI-Powered YouTube Video Summarization & Analysis
projects.subtitle: Automatically extract key insights, summaries, and analytics from YouTube videos using AI-driven processing.
projects.description: This system leverages AI to analyze YouTube videos and generate concise summaries, highlights, and actionable insights. It can process long-form content quickly, identify important segments, and provide analytics for content strategy or research purposes. The goal is to reduce manual review time and enhance understanding of video content.
challenge: Manually reviewing long videos was time-consuming
Extracting key points and highlights required significant effort
Tracking analytics and viewer insights across multiple videos was difficult
Summarizing content consistently was challenging
No automated workflow to combine summarization and analytics
solution: Input YouTube video URL into the workflow
AI NLP Engine transcribes and interprets the video content
Key segments and highlights are identified automatically
Analytics Automation compiles insights, statistics, and summaries
Optional steps include generating visual highlights, keyword extraction, and report creation
results: Fast extraction of summaries and highlights
Consistent and structured insights across all videos

cta.text: Want to automatically summarize and analyze your YouTube videos? Let’s build your workflow.

projects.title: AI-Powered WhatsApp Chatbot
projects.subtitle: A fully automated conversational AI system that handles customer queries, support, and engagement directly on WhatsApp.
projects.description: This chatbot leverages AI to interact with customers on WhatsApp in real time. It understands user messages, provides instant responses, and automates customer support workflows. The system reduces manual intervention, improves response times, and maintains consistent communication across all inquiries.
challenge: Responding to customer queries manually was slow
High volume of messages caused delayed support
No automated way to handle FAQs and routine questions
Maintaining personalized responses at scale was difficult
Manual tracking of conversations and follow-ups was error-prone
solution: Customer sends a message via WhatsApp
AI NLP Engine interprets the intent and context
Automation Logic triggers appropriate response or action
WhatsApp API sends the reply to the customer
Optional steps include follow-up reminders, escalation to human agents, and conversation analytics
results: Reduced manual workload for support staff
Automated tracking and analytics of all conversations

cta.text: Want to automate your customer support and engagement on WhatsApp? Let’s build your chatbot.

projects.title: AI Calendar Agent & Virtual Receptionist
projects.subtitle: A fully automated assistant that manages scheduling, booking, and client interactions using AI-driven logic and calendar integration.
projects.description: This automation system handles client appointments, calendar management, and virtual reception tasks. AI agents interact with clients, schedule meetings, and send reminders while maintaining a seamless, professional workflow. The goal was to reduce manual scheduling and streamline client communication from inquiry to confirmation.
challenge: Manual appointment scheduling was time-consuming
High risk of double-bookings and missed meetings
Managing multiple calendars across team members was difficult
No automated follow-ups or reminders for clients
Human reception required constant attention, even outside business hours
solution: Client submits appointment request via email or form
AI agent interprets request and checks availability
Calendar API schedules meeting and avoids conflicts
Automated confirmation emails and reminders sent to clients
Optional steps include follow-ups, rescheduling, and multi-platform notifications
results: Appointments scheduled automatically without manual intervention

cta.text: Want a virtual assistant to handle your scheduling and client interactions? Let’s set it up.

projects.title: AI Long-Form Video Content Automation
projects.subtitle: A fully automated system that transforms short inputs, scripts, or images into complete long-form AI-generated videos using n8n, FAL, and KIE.
projects.description: This automation pipeline generates long-form AI videos by orchestrating multiple tools together. n8n handles the workflow logic, FAL processes and compiles multiple video segments, and KIE is used to create high-quality VEO3-style video outputs. The goal was to automate the entire video creation lifecycle—from raw input to polished, ready-to-publish content.
challenge: Creating long-form videos manually was time-consuming
AI tools required manual uploading, downloading, and combining
No unified workflow to manage scripts, clips, and rendering
Difficult to maintain consistent quality across video segments
Editing and assembling multiple assets took hours of manual work
solution: Input script, prompts, or images received by the workflow
n8n prepares structured scenes, transitions, and content layouts
KIE generates VEO3-style video scenes based on the prepared prompts
FAL processes all generated clips and compiles them into a single long-form video
Final video rendered and exported automatically
Optional automation steps include thumbnail generation, caption creation, and multi-platform export scheduling
results: Complete long-form videos generated without manual editing
70% faster production pipeline compared to manual workflows
Automated rendering and compilation of all video assets

cta.text: Interested in automating your video production pipeline? Let’s build your custom workflow.

projects.title: Automated Flyer Creation System
projects.subtitle: A fully automated workflow that generates branded, ready-to-use promotional flyers directly from CRM data—eliminating hours of manual design work.
projects.description: This system automates the creation of weekly marketing flyers by pulling product data, prices, and content from HubSpot, formatting it through n8n, and generating fully designed flyers using APITemplate. The goal was to eliminate repetitive design tasks, ensure brand consistency, and dramatically speed up marketing output.
challenge: Flyers were created manually every week
Copying product data from HubSpot took too long
Branding was inconsistent across different designers
Frequent human errors in product names and pricing
Multi-step process required formatting, image selection, and sending files manually
solution: Product data and pricing automatically pulled from HubSpot
Data cleaned and formatted using custom n8n logic
APITemplate generates branded flyers using predefined templates
Flyers automatically exported as PNG/PDF
Final flyers sent to the marketing team or stored in a shared folder
Optional features include multiple layouts and automated weekly scheduling
results: Zero manual formatting or copy-paste errors

cta.text: Want to automate your marketing content creation? Let’s build your system.

projects.title: Automated Employee Security Documentation System
projects.description: A desktop application that processes complex Excel datasets to automatically generate employee security passes, legal undertakings, and compliance reports. The custom automation engine removes manual work, ensures 100% data accuracy, and accelerates the entire document-issuance workflow.

about.story: I'm Mahmoud Alkady, an AI Automation & Integration Engineer. I specialize in building intelligent systems that do the heavy lifting for you. From custom AI agents to complex n8n workflows, I turn manual chaos into automated precision.
